擊.definition: to hit; to strike; to break; Taiwan pr. [ji2]

擊中.definition: to hit (a target etc); to strike

擊掌.definition: to clap one's hands; to clap each other's hands; high five

擊暈.definition: to stun; to render unconscious (with a blow)

擊潰.definition: to defeat; to smash; to rout

擊球.definition: to bat; to hit a ball (sport)

擊缶.definition: to beat time with a percussion instrument made of pottery

擊鼓傳花.definition: beat the drum, pass the flower (game in which players sit in a circle passing a flower around while a drum is beaten – when the drumbeat stops, the player holding the flower must sing a song, answer a question, or drink a glass of wine etc)

擊鼓鳴金.definition: to beat the drum and sound the gong (idiom); fig. to order an advance or retreat; to egg people on or to call them back
